sentences: Mulle meelis, et teda näha on väga raske. Näha jääb pidev ja erilise kujuga kõikjal.
Ta ei nähes midagi, sest tema nukker oli katki.
Ma nähes neid, kes mind tundsid.
context: The word 'näha' in Estonian is commonly used as a verb meaning to see or seeing. It can be used in various contexts such as literal sight, understanding, or perception.
